product: cable machine attachment / lat pulldown bar
material: steel with black matte powder coat finish
usage: cable machine exercises including pull down, press down, row, triceps, biceps and lat workouts

Builds stronger biceps, triceps, grip, lats, shoulders, and core

ai_description: A black matte steel lat pulldown bar with angled handles and textured grip areas. The bar features a central silver metal shackle for universal attachment to cable machines via carabiner. The construction shows sturdy steel components with a durable black powder coat finish. In lifestyle images, a man demonstrates its use for pulldown exercises, showing the V-shaped handle design with comfortable grip positions. The attachment point is prominently featured with silver hardware contrasting against the black matte surface.
target_audience: home gym users and fitness enthusiasts looking to enhance their cable machine routine
product_name: KAKSS Cable Machine Attachments Lat Bar Narrow
